cn.jpush.im.android.api.model

类 GroupAnnouncement

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.jpush.im.android.api.model.GroupAnnouncement

  • public abstract class GroupAnnouncement
extends java.lang.Object
    群公告，使用GroupInfo.getAnnouncementsByOrder(RequestCallback)获取
    从以下版本开始:
    2.8.0
